00038 void InteractiveCommand::parse_command_line(const char *line) {
00039   size_t cmd_len = strlen(this->command_text());
00040   const char *base, *ptr;
00041   string key, value;
00042 
00043   assert(!strncmp(line, command_text(), cmd_len));
00044 
00045   m_args.clear();
00046 
00047   ptr = line + cmd_len;
00048 
00049   while (true) {
00050 
00051     key = "";
00052     value = "";
00053 
00054     // skip whitespace
00055     while (*ptr && isspace(*ptr))
00056       ptr++;
00057     if (*ptr == 0)
00058       break;
00059 
00060     if (*ptr == '\"') {
00061       if (!parse_string_literal(ptr, key, &ptr))
00062         exit(1);
00063     }
00064     else {
00065       base = ptr;
00066       while (true) {
00067         if (*ptr == '=') {
00068           key = string(base, ptr-base);
00069           base = ++ptr;
00070           if (*base == '\"') {
00071             if (!parse_string_literal(base, value, &ptr))
00072               exit(1);
00073             break;
00074           }
00075           else {
00076             for (ptr=base; *ptr && !isspace(*ptr); ptr++)
00077               ;
00078             value = string(base, ptr-base);
00079             break;
00080           }
00081         }
00082         else if (*ptr == 0 || isspace(*ptr)) {
00083           key = string(base, ptr-base);
00084           break;
00085         }
00086         ptr++;
00087       }
00088     }
00089     m_args.push_back(pair<string, string>(key, value));
00090   }
00091 
00092 }

00096 bool InteractiveCommand::parse_string_literal(const char *str, std::string &text, const char **endptr) {
00097   int lastchar = *str;
00098   const char *ptr, *base;
00099 
00100   assert(*str == '"');
00101 
00102   base = str+1;
00103 
00104   for (ptr = base; *ptr; ++ptr) {
00105     if (*ptr == '\"' && lastchar != '\\')
00106       break;
00107     lastchar = *ptr;
00108   }
00109 
00110   if (*ptr == 0) {
00111     cerr << "Un-terminated string literal." << endl;
00112     return false;
00113   }
00114 
00115   text = string(base, ptr-base);
00116 
00117   *endptr = ptr+1;
00118   return true;
00119 }
